summary: An American geologist is monitoring a local volcano when the Supergator, a prehistoric alligator recreated from fossilized DNA, escapes from a secret bio-engineering research center.
cast: Brad Johnson|Kelly McGillis|Bianca Lawson|Mary Alexandra Stiefvater|Josh Kelly|John Colton|Holly Weber|Nick Nicotera|Elizabeth J. Carlisle|Meg Cionni|Greg Cipes|Matt Clendenin|Gene DeFrancis|Sarah DuBois|Sol Kahn|Ikaika Kahoano|Justin Loeb|Dave Ruskjer|Joanna Shewfelt|Charles Solomon Jr.|Jennifer Titus|Traci Toguchi|Holly Weber|Tamara Witmer|Eve Hands
title: Supergator
